website_summaries.verdict: A money-saving option on a single-Eero setup for small spaces.
pros: Individual Eero device is powerful enough to provide WiFi access to 1 or 2 rooms
Simple installation using any existing or provided Ethernet cable
cons: The older 1st generation design is not as fast as the current Eero device models

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy As Backup or for Whole System
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a backup for my existing Eero Pro (2nd generation) series, in case one of them goes bad, as I use the ethernet ports on my existing units. It's only a dual-band first generation unit, but at this price it's a good deal to buy them as backups or even get a few of them and set up your own system much more cheaply than buying a new system. They're refurbished and in plain packaging, as another reviewer has stated, but mine arrived in perfect shape with no scratches or blemishes of any kind on either the eero or its power brick, so they look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished Unit Improved Download Speed About 8-fold
customer_reviews.text: I already had an Eero system in place, with three remote devices. But as part of a troubleshooting exercise, one remote got moved to new location and we noticed a dramatic improvement in speed in one part of the house. So, when troubleshooting is over, and you have to return your remote to the original location - what can you do except buy one more unit? We didn't want to spend what was needed for a full cost additional remote. So we bought this refurbished one for about a third the cost. Works GREAT! Up and working easily and download speed in that location went from 15-20 Mbps to 120-150 Mbps.
customer_reviews.author: HalKid2

customer_reviews.title: Eero gen one with ARRIS SB8200 modem fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I won't pay for Comcast modem or router and the eero gen one with ARRIS SB8200 is fantastic. I need the GIG. Ha! I replaced an Apple Airport Extreme with Time Machine. My wireless network speed is more than five times faster. Eero setup and operation is really engineered well. I have been a professional engineer in Industrial Engineering for several decades now and these guys are good. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: O. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: After 2+ years, still very happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought my eeros back in mid-2017, and am absolutely happy with them. I was having an issue about a year ago where my computer would occasionally lose its connection, and eero support was OUTSTANDING in helping me troubleshoot the problem. I mean, they worked with me for 2 months monitoring what was going on (it only happened every few days), and finally replaced one of the units. (In the end, though, it wasn't a hardware issue, which we only discovered when we got the replacement and the problem continued; it was a settings issue, which had been fixed in a prior release.) BUY THE EERO FOR THE SUPPORT. It is an excellent product, but their support is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: David Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Speedy WiFi that Works
customer_reviews.text: These things are incredibly easy to setup and work incredibly well. Our internet went from about 70-100 Mbps down to 200 just by replacing our old TP-Link router with one of these. I can open the app and see all the devices on our network, all the activity that's going on, set custom DNS family filter settings, and check if there are firmware updates, which it looks like they release about once a month. Pretty awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Expand Gen II System
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to the more expensive beacons that are available for Gen II eero. Currently I have the Gen II system with 2 beacons and a eero unit, given the construction material, age, size and configuration of the house I definitely needed another beacon for the family room. eero suggested that I try Amazon's Refurb Gen I eero unit. Works like a charm, set up was a breeze, and it is chugging away with 19 or so devices connected to it now. My pocketbook is still intact, WIFI harmony has been restored. Thank you eero.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Muzic

customer_reviews.title: An easy setup at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This was so easy to set up! It took less than 5 minutes!! This is my first WiFi and I’m thrilled with this. I live in a small place 800 sq ft. The one Eero I bought gives me a great signal through the entire house, even outside on the deck. I’m no longer tied to the desktop- I can take my iPad to bed with me or outside, and I don’t have to worry about cell data usage anymore. You can’t beat the price of this unit, it’s so reasonable, especially after online research showed Eero is the way to go. Sorry I waited so long, glad I got the refurbished Eero.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the original mesh WiFi system that everybody else is trying to copy nowadays
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, hardware wise. The Eeros get hot during normal operation but it seems to be normal. We will see about long-term durability, I will be updating this review accordingly. Software-wise... one of the things why I decided to go with Eero over the competition was the Eero plus security suite and I got charged by mistake when trying to activate the included Malwarebytes subscription but customer service for both Eero and Malwarebytes took responsibility and sorted it out, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing with fios
customer_reviews.text: Ok at first people said for Verizon fios you have to connect it to another router which is false because I have fios gigabit internet and I have an ont box on the side of my house and if you don't know what ont is it stands for optical network terminal that's where your fios services come from I have a cat 5 ethernet from the box to my house and I plugged it into the eero router and the set up was a breeze and I am getting alot of speed my download speed is 936.39 and upload is 948.88 but note not everyone will get this speed if you dont have a fiber gigabit connection
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great - just like new
customer_reviews.text: Needed a 4th eero to fill in a dead spot in my house. Discovered after installing a Ring. Ring wanted me to purchase their WiFi extender to solve some connection issues, which I didn't think was a practical solution. Instead, I purchased an additional eero for my setup. The refurbished price is what made it justifiable and I'm glad I went this route as the product arrived in great shape and looks/performs like new. Definitely the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: J. Martinson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing range
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy and fast, but results were less than optimal. I live in a one-bedroom apartment all on one level and I have poor coverage except in the room where the router is located. I bought this to replace a 12-year-old Apple Airport and WiFi extender because Apple has drooped support for the Airport, but I'll probably have to go back to it since this doesn’t do the job at all.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J

customer_reviews.title: failed after just a month of use
customer_reviews.text: Both of these refurbished eeros have failed just after over 1 month of use. Customer service is very slow to respond from the eero website for the warranty. Overall it was a very simple system to set up but is worthless if they break so easily.
customer_reviews.author: T leaf

customer_reviews.title: These EERO's are great, literally half price of a brand new unit. Work perfectly.  Great WiFi coverage, even with just one.
customer_reviews.text: These EERO's are great, literally half price of a brand new unit. They look pretty new to me, you can't tell it's refurbished except they come in a plain brown box. I installed EERO's at three of my family's houses where they have cable internet and it more than doubled the internet speed at all three houses. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, they work... But,
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, they work. But in order to get enough coverage for a two story house you will have to buy several and spend twice as much as you would spend for a good standard type Wi-Fi router
customer_reviews.author: BBG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. Works great. Solved my problem. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a second access point because wifi was weak in one room. I had already run ethernet cable. Because of my ISP (Frontier FiOS) the router needed to run in bridge mode. Eero had a tech bulletin that came up in a google search that specifically said their unit would work. And it does!
customer_reviews.author: curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Zero dead spots
customer_reviews.text: Our house is built like a bunker and WiFi won't travel far. This is the 5th one and we have zero dead zones. The EERO app is fantastic. We cut the kid off when it's bedtime
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Best wifi I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Best wifi system I have ever used, i bought an extra to put in the garage added instantly and it was a breeze to setup!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device!
customer_reviews.text: Eero, very simplistic yet very powerful! Love it! Great features and it's all easily managed via an app on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whicker

customer_reviews.title: Great speed and no wires
customer_reviews.text: If you dont have Eero what are you waiting for. Full home and yard coverage without wires. My daughter loves me again.
customer_reviews.author: Wane R. Keifer

customer_reviews.title: Added this to existing mesh, works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.text: Added this refurbished unit to my existing two eero’s and it works perfectly. Glad I purchased the refurbished one and save money! Works flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: mrkae

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Replaces a dead eero. Brings wifi across our old lath and plaster house with a total of 4 eeros.
customer_reviews.author: gustav zantanon

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage but runs hit to the touch
customer_reviews.text: Looks new and great WiFi coverage. Gave it four and not five stars as the device is extremely hot so I have to stand it on its side to help cool it off
customer_reviews.author: Roland Kissoon

customer_reviews.title: Eero is a Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad a made the switch to Eero from the traditional wireless router. My internet works so much better now and my only regret is that I didn't do this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: UT Vols Fan

customer_reviews.title: Works great, eero system is best I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this older eero to keep my solar power panel hard wired in my garage. This works great and was refurbished through Amazon and has no issues. Great deal for a great WiFi system.
customer_reviews.author: Dk

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD CONNECTION
customer_reviews.text: IT IS REALLY HELPING ME WITH MY INTERNET CONNECTION. MODEM IS IN THE BEDROOM AND FARE AWAY IN MY OFFICE IS MY COMPUTER. PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zolanana

customer_reviews.title: Very good WiFi system
customer_reviews.text: Have system through cable provider so decided to purchase additional eero. Works really well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Helps extend the signal
customer_reviews.text: Hate companies that you have to send emails for tech support. Wish the signal was a little better, but at least it improved it
customer_reviews.author: Dunndeal4u

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: eero top of the line product, I have three works well
customer_reviews.author: KEITH P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and works great. Better than any other system I've had.
customer_reviews.author: ralph m mumper

customer_reviews.title: Robust mesh wifi
customer_reviews.text: I implemented 3 nodes in a semi-rural environment consisting of home and barnyard. Extremely easy to install over the top of xfinity. Robust coverage even when power was spotty. The mobile app is both intuitive and informative. Delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. Works well and was even package good.
customer_reviews.author: Republic Royalties

customer_reviews.title: Set it and forget it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Solved all my Wifi troubles. It works so well that I forgot it exists I did the experiment replacing the eeros with Google Wifi installing them in the same locations and the Google Wifis performed worse. Eero has better coverage, faster roaming and easier setup. The eero app has less features than the Google but that’s not as important for me.
customer_reviews.author: Josef Marton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this router! It’s super fast and i have had no issues with it whatsoever. It’s always on and very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Small but does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: Does a much better job than my old netgear router! Now get whole house coverage, plus out back on my porch! Small in size, but big on performance!!!
customer_reviews.author: Garry Helton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and really easy to install with their app
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are great units for covering your entire home with WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: JohnM

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup. Wide range of coverage. My home is only 1100 sq ft but it easily reaches every bit and outside as well. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: tres sceptical

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the entire return period then stopped as soon as I was stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: Matt Fede

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value
customer_reviews.text: eero eliminated my dead spots and overall improved the speed of my network. Great value, I've haven't seen this product offered this low before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOA but eero support is AWESOME! 4th Network
customer_reviews.text: Great price but DOA unit. This is my 4th network and 20th device. EERO IS GREAT! Next day replacement unit. This will make network #4 with 5 beacons at each location. THIS. IS. WORRYFREE. WIFI. NO JOKE. You will set it up ONCE and either sell your house with it or take it with you.
customer_reviews.author: BLM

customer_reviews.title: Not worth giving up my personal info
customer_reviews.text: You cannot setup this router without the app and creating an account, and that requires both your email and phone number! That’s incredible invasion of privacy. I have never setup a router that request personal info. There is no need to have an account to use a router. I assume they track your usage. It will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: ari

product_meta.title: eero Home WiFi System – 1st Generation (Certified Refurbished) - Advanced Mesh WiFi System to Replace Traditional Routers and WiFi Range Extenders (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: HOME WIFI SYSTEM: eero Home Wi-Fi System (Gen 1) replaces your wireless router, range extenders, and internet boosters by covering a 1-2 bedroom home with fast and reliable Wi-Fi. eero-certified REFURBISHED: Refurbished eeros undergo a complete system functional and cosmetic tests to ensure the product meets as-new Wi-Fi performance and cosmetic standards. MESH WIFI TECHNOLOGY: Powered by proprietary True Mesh technology, the eero Wi-Fi system leverages multiple access points to provide your home with incredibly dependable internet, all on a single home network. QUICK & EASY SETUP: Replacing your old Wi-Fi router has never been easier than with the eero Home Wi-Fi System. Set up takes minutes and the companion mobile app makes managing your home internet simple and intuitive. WHAT'S INCLUDED: eero-certified refurbished units are shipped in a corrugated cardboard box with an eero power adapter and an eero Ethernet cable.
feature_bullets: WHOLE HOME WIFI SYSTEM: The eero WiFi System (1st Generation) replaces the traditional WiFi router, WiFi extender, and internet booster by covering a 2-4 bedroom home with fast and reliable internet powered by a mesh network.

eero-certified REFURBISHED WiFi System: Refurbished eeros undergo complete system, functional, and cosmetic tests to ensure the product meets as-new WiFi performance and cosmetic standards to bring you the most cutting-edge home WiFi system.

MESH NETWORK: Powered by proprietary TrueMesh technology, the eero WiFi mesh router leverages multiple access points to create a mesh network to provide your home with incredibly dependable internet, all on a single home WiFi system.

QUICK & EASY SETUP: Replacing your old WiFi router has never been easier than with the eero Whole Home WiFi System. Set up takes minutes and the companion mobile app makes managing your home WiFi simple and intuitive.

WHAT'S INCLUDED: eero-certified refurbished WiFi systems are shipped in a corrugated cardboard box with an eero power adapter and an eero Ethernet cable. This WiFi system is covered by a 90-day warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
